headline.main: 'AUSSIES' BUY HATS FOR MRS. M'ARTHUR; Five Sergeant Pilots, Here on Leave, Send 3 Bonnets as Tribute to Her Husband

lead_paragraph: What started out yesterday afternoon to be a publicity stunt, made to order and full of "appeal," ended in a sincere tribute to General Douglas MacArthur by five sergeants of the Royal Australian Air Force.
abstract: RAAF sgts, on leave, N Y C, pay tribute to MacArthur by buying gift for his wife
snippet: What started out yesterday afternoon to be a publicity stunt, made to order and full of "appeal," ended in a sincere tribute to General Douglas MacArthur by five sergeants of the Royal Australian Air Force....
